short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Canvas extension for Open-ICT assessments

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This tool contains multiple small handy extensions for improving the life of an open-ICT student. Ranging from Canvas auto-rubric add to better board display on gitlabs.
